raumakustik¶

class room_calc.room(volume, surface, sub_surface, alpha, sub_alpha, use)¶

Class inheriting all functions for calculations and making plots.

criticalDistance()¶

Function to calculate the critical distance, where the energy densities of the direct and reflected soundfield are equal. Calculation is made with an approximate formula based on statistical acoustics in a diffuse soundfield.

equivalentAbsorptionSurface()¶

Function to calculate the equivalent absorption surface.

equivalentAbsorptionSurface_people(peopleDescription, numberOfPeople)¶

Function to add equivalent absorption surface based on the number of people in the room and their specification regarding age and position (e.g. standing, sitting). Data retrieved from Table A.1 in DIN 18041

plot_reverberationTime()¶

Function, which returns a plot of the reverberation time in octave bands.

plot_reverberationTime_ratio()¶

Function, which returns a plot of the calculated reverberation time in comparison to the wanted reverberation time and the allowed deviations in octave bands.

reverberationTime()¶

Function to calculate the reverberation time.

reverberationTime_ratio()¶

Function to calculate the ratio of given reverberation time to wanted reverberation time. Wanted reverberation time is based on the rooms use case and its volume.

utils.add_row(list)¶

Funktion um Daten der Datenbank hinzuzufügen
